title: Drop Dead Queen
description: In the darkness they lurk, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.Danger is everywhere, and not even Quinton can protect me. Someone wants me dead and they’ll do anything to achieve their goal.I’m back to being a rat scurrying through the halls of Corium and I know it won’t be long till I’m caught in a trap.The only question is, can I save myself this time?This is a Dark Bully Romance, and book TWO of a trilogy. King of Corium must be read prior to Drop Dead Queen.
author: C. Hallman
